synopsis.text:
Bishounen Series, set in the prestigious Yubiwa Private Academy, introduces us to the Pretty Boy Detective Club, a unique group dedicated to solving problems deemed 'beautiful' by their charismatic leader, Manabu Soutouin. The story unfolds when Mayumi Doujima, a determined girl with a peculiar sight, seeks their help to find a star she glimpsed once as a child.

Mayumi, who has vowed to abandon her astronaut dreams if she fails to find the star by her 14th birthday, finds an unexpected ally in the eccentric Manabu and his team of pretty boy detectives. Each member of the club is unique, from the aesthete Manabu to the epicure Michiru, the Adonis Hyouta, the orator Nagahiro, and the artiste Sousaku.

However, Mayumi's extraordinary vision, which allows her to see details others miss, leads the club into a mystery far more profound than they anticipated. As they delve deeper into the search for the lost star, they find themselves entangled in a world full of danger and stunning beauty.

Join Mayumi and the Pretty Boy Detective Club in this dazzling mystery-adventure, adapted from Ishin Nishio's novel series, as they embark on an extraordinary journey to find the elusive star. Which of these pretty boys will be your favorite? Only one way to find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
